mapper.select: select comment.no, article_no, writer_no, users.name writer_name, date_format(reg_date, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') reg_date, content from comment join users on comment.writer_no=users.no where article_no=#{article_no} order by comment.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment(no, article_no, writer_no, reg_date, content) values (null, #{article_no}, #{writer_no}, now(), #{content})
